keyword: how many calories in cheez its
title: How Many Calories in Cheez-Its?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in Cheez-Its per serving, including carbs, fat, protein, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Original cheddar flavor Cheez-Its; 1 serving = 27 crackers (30 g); dry, no added toppings or dips.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, brand batch, serving size, and additions like dips. Check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One serving of Cheez-Its (27 crackers) contains 150 kcal and 3 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tbsp ranch dip per serving

faqs.q: How many calories in one serving of Cheez-Its?
faqs.a: About 150 kcal for 27 original Cheez-Its crackers.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Cheez-Its?
faqs.a: One serving has 17 g total carbs, including 1 g fiber and 0 g sugars.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in Cheez-Its?
faqs.a: 230 mg per serving, so watch intake if monitoring salt.
Yes, 8 g total fat per serving, with 2.5 g saturated.

faqs.q: How many calories in a handful of Cheez-Its?
faqs.a: A handful (about 10-15 crackers) is roughly 55-80 kcal; measure for accuracy.
